select count(m.id) as total from (select message.id, message.sender_id from message where message.status = 1 and message.receiver_id = 1) as m
left join teacher on m.sender_id = teacher.id
where teacher.status = 1

select m.title, m.id, m.receiver_id, m.send_time, m.has_read, student.name from (select message.id, message.title, message.send_time, message.has_read, message.receiver_id from message where message.status = 1 and message.sender_id = #{senderId}) as m left join student on m.receiver_id = student.id limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
